qas.question: Youtube offers users the option to watch content where?
What is used to embed a youtube video to a webpage?
What is the most common use of embedded youtube videos?
What is a video called when a person records themselves watching a different video?
When did youtube officially remove the response feature?

plausible_answers.text: embed it on any page on the Web

qas.question: What does the HMTL piece that accompanies each video do?

plausible_answers.text: embed YouTube videos in social networking pages and blogs

qas.question: What is the HMTL functionality often used for?

plausible_answers.text: that it would remove video responses for being an underused feature

qas.question: What did YouTube announce on August 13, 2017?

plausible_answers.text: Embedding, rating, commenting and response posting

qas.question: What are the features video users can disable?
